rev.comment: Action Center has a new interface

+
[[Image:Action Center on Windows 7.png|thumb|right|The new [[Windows Action Center]] which replaces [[Windows Security Center]]]]
Windows 7 includes a number of new features, such as advances in touch, [[speech recognition|speech]], and [[handwriting recognition]], support for [[Virtual Hard Disk|virtual hard disks]], improved performance on [[multi-core]] processors<ref> http://www.windowsvienna.com/windows-7-takes-more-advantage-of-multi-core-cpus-a24.html </ref><ref> http://blogs.zdnet.com/microsoft/?p=1612 </ref><ref> http://www.pctipsbox.com/windows-7-to-get-parallel-processing-tweaks/ </ref><ref> http://vista.blorge.com/2008/09/30/windows-7-enters-parallel-universe/ </ref>, improved [[booting|boot]] performance, and [[kernel (computer science)|kernel]] improvements.
Windows 7 includes a number of new features, such as advances in touch, [[speech recognition|speech]], and [[handwriting recognition]], support for [[Virtual Hard Disk|virtual hard disks]], improved performance on [[multi-core]] processors<ref> http://www.windowsvienna.com/windows-7-takes-more-advantage-of-multi-core-cpus-a24.html </ref><ref> http://blogs.zdnet.com/microsoft/?p=1612 </ref><ref> http://www.pctipsbox.com/windows-7-to-get-parallel-processing-tweaks/ </ref><ref> http://vista.blorge.com/2008/09/30/windows-7-enters-parallel-universe/ </ref>, improved [[booting|boot]] performance, and [[kernel (computer science)|kernel]] improvements.
